Dahntay Jones

Dahntay Lavall Jones

Position: Small Forward and Shooting Guard ▪ Shoots: Right

6-6, 225lb (198cm, 102kg)

Born: December 27, 1980 in Trenton, New Jersey us

Relatives: Cousin Al Harrington

Colleges: Rutgers University, Duke

High School: Steinert in Hamilton, New Jersey

Recruiting Rank: 1998 (91)

Draft: Boston Celtics, 1st round (20th pick, 20th overall), 2003 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: November 21, 2003

Career Length: 13 years

Where was Dahntay Jones born?

Dahntay Jones was born in Trenton, New Jersey.

When was Dahntay Jones born?

Dahntay Jones was born on December 27, 1980.

How tall is Dahntay Jones?

Dahntay Jones is 6-6 (198 cm) tall.

How much did Dahntay Jones weigh when playing?

Dahntay Jones weighed 225 lbs (102 kg) when playing.

Is Dahntay Jones in the Hall of Fame?

Dahntay Jones is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Dahntay Jones drafted?

Dahntay Jones was drafted by Boston Celtics, 1st round (20th pick, 20th overall), 2003 NBA Draft.

What position did Dahntay Jones play?

Small Forward and Shooting Guard.

When did Dahntay Jones retire?

Dahntay Jones last played in 2017.

What is Dahntay Jones' net worth?

Dahntay Jones made at least $18,017,231 playing professional basketball.

How much did Dahntay Jones make?

Dahntay Jones made $2,900,000 in 2013.

What did Dahntay Jones average?

Dahntay Jones averaged 5.4 points, 1.7 rebounds, and 0.8 assists per game.

How many rings does Dahntay Jones have?

Dahntay Jones won one championship.

What schools did Dahntay Jones attend?

Dahntay Jones attended Steinert in Hamilton, New Jersey, Rutgers University and Duke.
